#Material property data for 4140 Steel

k = {46, 44, 41, 39, 37.5, 35, 33, 32.5, 30, 29, 28, 27.5, 30, 30, 30}

ctemps = {0, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900, 1000, 1100, 1200, 1300, 1400}

c = {475e6, 475e6, 525e6, 540e6, 560e6, 640e6, 730e6, 825e6, 825e6, 600e6, 600e6, 600e6, 600e6, 600e6, 600e6}

rho = {7.85e-09}

emissivity = {0.55}

meltT = {1460}
